name: tracer-desktop
description: Desktop app for Chromium session capture with DevTools timeline
author: Tracer

scripts.dev:main: tsup src/main/main.ts src/main/preload.ts --watch --format cjs --out-dir dist/main --sourcemap --external electron
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run typecheck && npm run build:renderer && npm run build:main
scripts.build:main: tsup src/main/main.ts src/main/preload.ts --format cjs --out-dir dist/main --sourcemap --external electron
scripts.dist:mac: npm run generate:icons && cross-env PLAYWRIGHT_BROWSERS_PATH=0 npm run build && cross-env PLAYWRIGHT_BROWSERS_PATH=0 electron-builder --config electron-builder.yml --mac dmg zip
scripts.dist:installer: npm run generate:icons && cross-env PLAYWRIGHT_BROWSERS_PATH=0 npm run build && cross-env PLAYWRIGHT_BROWSERS_PATH=0 electron-builder --config electron-builder.yml --win nsis
scripts.dist:portable: npm run generate:icons && cross-env PLAYWRIGHT_BROWSERS_PATH=0 npm run build && cross-env PLAYWRIGHT_BROWSERS_PATH=0 electron-builder --config electron-builder.yml --win portable
